description:
The titular characters on Netflix's Sense8 got a very special birthday present Saturday: a Season 2 pickup.Netflix网超感8人组的各位主演们在周六为这部剧奉上了一个非常特别的生日礼物: 第二季的续订。

Netflix announced the renewal via Twitter, with a video that featured many of the cast members singing "Happy Birthday" to the sensates and sharing the news that Season 2 is in the works.Netflix通过Twitter宣布续订第二季，同时还发布了一段主演们唱着生日快乐歌的小视频。

The series, created by Andy and Lana Wachowski (The Matrix), follows a group of eight strangers from around the world who suddenly find themselves reborn as "sensates" who are emotionally and sensually connected to one another.这是一部由Andy和Lana Wachowski执导并编剧的科幻美剧，此剧描写了来自世界各地的八个陌生人突然发现自己在情感和思想上互相“链接感应”的故事。
